feed.title: Revisiting the BIPS process, a proposal

entry.title: Revisiting the BIPS process, a proposal
entry.summary: Jean-Paul Kogelman shared a link to the Bitcoin protocol specification wiki page with an unknown recipient on October 21, 2013. However, Jean-Paul warned that the information on the wiki page was incomplete and advised caution while using it. The context indicates that the recipient might have been seeking information related to the Bitcoin protocol.
